title: Cherish
description: TimI swore off relationships.After everything I went through with Vanessa, I know better.The last thing I need is a woman who needs to be saved.But when Lize turns up in my life, the chemistry between us is off the charts.I have no other choice but to fight for her.LizeMy life is hell.Iâ€™ve taken on the responsibility to care for my mother.Between jobs, I try to look after her as best I can,but my stepfather makes that nearly impossible.I vowed never to trust a man again, but when I fall into the arms of rock hero Tim,I have a hard time sticking to my own rules.CHERISH is a complete stand-alone and can be read without reading any of the other books in the Full Moon series, but if you prefer to read in order, start with TRUST and FATE as the characters do interconnect.
author: Stacy Stone
